ngiemboon: Mefɛ̌ mefɛ̌, anò gie peg ge lɔg cʉ́me á gwɔ́ pɔ́ ngie peg ka shwóŋo gẅí ntí gie à lɔɔn ńgwɔ́ pi lɔg ńnéŋe púʼu, anò gí poŋ Ssé. Á ge gǎa wɔ́ɔ pi ne ńnéŋe pɔ́ púʼu. Táʼ peg giŋé ne sẅíŋte gẅí, tà ḿbúʼu pɔ́ mbwó na lezíŋ Cʉ̀apʉ̀a Yěsô ngie, pi gÿo pɔ́ púʼu, ńdɔg ńgee mvfò.
en: Additionally then, brothers and sisters, we ask and encourage you in the Lord Jesus, that as you have received instruction from us on how you should live and please God #— #as you are doing    #— #do this even more.

ngiemboon: Pi zɔɔn ne ńzsé mmó gie peg la lɔg lezíŋ Cʉ̀apʉ̀a Yěsô ńtsẅi ngie pi gÿo.
en: For you know what commands we gave you through the Lord Jesus.

ngiemboon: Ammó gie e Ssé ne ńkwoŋo á gwɔ́ pɔ́ ngie pi gwɔ́ ndʉalʉ̌a, tà mbàŋa faʼ panzwě, tà panzwě faʼ mbàŋa,
en: For this is God’s will,   your sanctification:  # 4:3 Rm 6:19,22; 1Co 1:30; 2Th 2:13; 1Tm 2:15; Heb 12:14; 1Pt 1:2 that you keep away  # 4:3 1Tm 4:3 from sexual immorality,

ngiemboon: ngie wɔ̌wɔ́ɔ tsetsɛ̀ɛ pi kúʼte mbùm ye na ntí gie e Ssé ne ńkwoŋo, yɛ̌ ntí ŋwɛ́ ee gie e gẅiin mekùʼ.
en: that each of you knows how to control his own body   in holiness and honor,

ngiemboon: Tà á le zẅíŋ nkwaŋá tepòŋ jÿó yé páʼ é jÿó pʉ̀a pie é té Ssé zsé wɔ́.
en: not with lustful passions,   like the Gentiles, who don’t know God.

ngiemboon: Tá á gʉa na nò manzwě, tà nyìŋ gÿo nò tepòŋ na fɛ̌ we, tà á zɔɔn fó fʉte yé fʉte, mélàʼmie Cʉ̀apʉ̀a wege ge láʼ néŋ ngɔ́ʼ twó pʉ̀a pie é gÿo púʼu. Peg la láʼ shwóŋo gẅí tà shwóŋ.
en: This means one must not transgress against and take advantage   of a brother or sister in this manner, because the Lord is an avenger of all these offenses, as we also previously told and warned you.

ngiemboon: E Ssé la zɔɔn te tóŋo wégè ngie pege gÿo menò mie é gẅiin ncÿǒ wɔ́, à la tóŋo wégè ngie pege gẅiin pɔ́ mà gẅie aa we pʉ̀a pé.
en: For God has not called us to impurity   but to live in holiness.

ngiemboon: Púʼu la, nyìŋ gẅie à juʼú yɔɔn nò ńdʉʼ, à těen ńdʉʼʉ pɔ́ nyìŋ mesoŋ wɔ́, à lʉʼʉ pɔ́ Ssé gie e la náa zẅìge ndʉalʉ̌a yé mbwó pi.
en: Consequently, anyone who rejects this does not reject man, but God, who gives you his Holy Spirit.

ngiemboon: Atsɔ́ mmó gie ngwɔ́ n ŋweʼe, ńná né pi ńtí nkwòŋe tsetsɛ̀ɛ mefɛ̌ mefɛ̌, á té wó wɔ́, n gɔɔn nue pi ka ziʼí pɔ́ kwàʼ mbwó Ssé lékwoŋ mennɛ́ mí.
en: About brotherly love: You don’t need me to write you because you yourselves are taught by God   to love one another.  # 4:9 1Jn 3:11

ngiemboon: Pi piŋ ne ḿbú ńkwoŋo mefɛ̌ mefɛ̌ pie ée Makendónia ntsèm. Púʼu la, peg ne ńkẅiŋte gẅí ngie pi gíŋe ńkẅiʼi ńdɔg ńgʉa né mvfò.
en: In fact, you are doing this toward all the brothers and sisters in the entire region of Macedonia.   But we encourage you, brothers and sisters, to do this even more,

ngiemboon: Pi kag tʉ̀, ńnéŋe té cÿɔ́g tsetsɛ̀ɛ pi, nyìŋ gẅi gɔɔn nò pɔ́ na nò gie á ne ńdíe yé. Pi lɔg ntóŋ mbwó mí, éfaʼ tá ńjÿó páʼ peg la gɔɔn la,
en: to seek to lead a quiet life,   to mind your own business,  # 4:11 Lit to practice one’s own things and to work  # 4:11 2Th 3:12; 2Jn 8 with your own hands, as we commanded you,

ngiemboon: ńzsé ngie pʉ̀a pie é té pʉ̀a Keleto wɔ́, ge gyá púʼu, é gɔʼte gi ntí lenéŋè. Pi piŋ ńké le cʉ́ʼʉ pìʼ á mbwó tsɔ̌ nyìŋ wɔ́.
en: so that you may behave properly   in the presence of outsiders and not be dependent on anyone.  # 4:12 Or not need anything, or not be in need,# 4:12 Eph 4:28

ngiemboon: Mefɛ̌ mefɛ̌, peg ne ńkwoŋo ngie pi zsé nò nénʉ́ gie á líe mepfó, légwɔ́ gie pi te néŋe né lemÿɔ̀g páʼ petsɔ́ pʉ̀a mesoŋ pie é té ne ńzẅíʼte tsɔ́ mmó mbwó Ssé wɔ́ wɔ́.
en: We do not want you to be uninformed, brothers and sisters, concerning those who are asleep, so that you will not grieve like the rest, who have no hope.

ngiemboon: Pege ne ńzẅíŋe ngie Yěsô la kwé, ḿbiŋ ńzíme na legwé. Áa púʼu, ńdɔgɔ ńgwɔ́ ndʉŋndʉŋ páʼ e Ssé ge láʼ lɔgɔ Yěsô gÿo pʉ̀a pie é la gwaa kwé, ńne ńzába ntʉ́m na yé, é zím.
en: For if we believe that Jesus died and rose   again,  # 4:14 Rm 14:9,15; 1Co 8:11; 15:3–4; 2Co 5:15 in the same way, through Jesus,  # 4:14 Jn 14:19; Rm 8:11; 1Co 6:14; 15:18–20; 2Co 4:14; Php 1:23 God will bring with him those who have fallen asleep.

ngiemboon: Pi zɔɔn ńjúʼu yɔɔn nò gie peg gee ngɔ̌ɔn, á gwɔ́ tsɔ́ tàʼa nò gẅie Cʉ̀apʉ̀a la shwóŋo wégè ngie: Epʉ̀a pégè pie Cʉ̀apʉ̀a ge láʼ gwaa tó, pɔ́ nyé pɔ́ ntʉ̀ntʉ̀ té ge láʼ luŋ mvfò tá pʉ̀a pie é la kwé e pɔ́ɔnte wɔ́.
en: For we say this to you by a word from the Lord:   We who are still alive at the Lord’s coming  # 4:15 1Jn 2:28 will certainly not precede those who have fallen asleep.  # 4:15 1Co 15:51

ngiemboon: Á ge láʼa lyɛ̌ʼ ayɛ̌, mé júʼ ngyè Cʉ̀apʉ̀a e cʉ́m, à lɔg ngyè tàʼ Cÿɔ́ʼ Ssé welÿò ńgɔɔn nò, ngyè ntaŋ ye e cʉ́m, kwàʼ yé Cʉ̀apʉ̀a à fó tÿǒ lepwó ésẅɛ́ʼ, epʉ̀a pie é la gwaa kwé, ńne ńzába ntʉ́m na yé, e vɔg ńzíme na legwé.
en: For the Lord himself will descend from heaven with a shout,  ,# 4:16 Jn 5:25 with the archangel’s  # 4:16 Jd 9 voice, and with the trumpet of God, and the dead in Christ  # 4:16 Rm 16:7; 1Co 15:18; 1Pt 5:14; Rv 14:13; 20:5 will rise first.

ngiemboon: Epʉ̀a pégè pie é ge láʼ nyé ntʉ̀ntʉ̀, e Ssé pɔ́ɔnte ńkaa wɔ́b lâ pɔ̌ á na melɔ́ɔn, pâ pɔ̌ metsèm gʉa ńkẅɛ́te Cʉ̀apʉ̀a wege á tÿǒ. Pâ pɔ̌ lâ Cʉ̀apʉ̀a láʼa ńcʉ́ʼʉ ńgwɔ́ pɔ́ lejʉ́ŋ yé.
en: Then   we who are still alive, who are left, will be caught up together with them in the clouds  # 4:17 Mt 26:64 to meet the Lord in the air, and so we will always be with the Lord.

ngiemboon: Púʼu la, pi néŋe ńdɔgɔ shwóŋè yɔɔn, ésele ńkẅiŋte mennɛ́ mí.
en: Therefore encourage   one another with these words.
